explains: n. 香（树脂、香料等燃烧可得香气的物质）；焚香时的烟，香气；奉承

sentences.en: The air was sweet with incense.
sentences.cn: 空气中弥漫着燃香的香气。

sentences.en: This proposal will incense conservation campaigners.
sentences.cn: 这项提议将激怒自然保护的倡导者。

sentences.en: There is an altar for incense in the temple.
sentences.cn: 神殿里有一个供着香的祭坛。
